```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head_out = df.head()
    describe_output = df.describe()
    
    return [head_out, describe_output]

result = preview_data(data)
print(result[0])
print(result[1])

preview_data(data)

```
